title: Create or Amend Additional Directorship Dividend Request
description: Create or Amend Additional Directorship Dividend Request

companyDirector.description: Indicates whether a taxable entity is a director or not

closeCompany.description: Indicates whether the company is a close company. This is required where companyDirector property is true.

directorshipCeasedDate.description: Date when the directorship ceased. This will cease the rollover across tax years for custom employments that were created for Additional Dividends and Directorship. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

companyName.description: The name by which the company is registered with Companies House. This is required where closeCompany is true.

companyNumber.description: The number by which the company is registered with Companies House. This is required where closeCompany is true.

shareholding.description:
The percentage shareholding of the company. This is required where closeCompany is true. Where there is no shareholding, a zero can be submitted.

The value must be between 0 and 100 up to 2 decimal places.

dividendReceived.description:
The amount of dividends received from the company. This is required where closeCompany is true. Where no dividends are received, a zero can be submitted.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
